title: Design for Printed Textile-Variation on Diamonds, series #960
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Cut paper mountd on white tracing paper, red colored pencil
description: A regular grid pattern of brown, light brown and beige cut paper diamonds with small black paper diamonds scattered irregularly across design
name: Collage
